title: I have cancer again (not literally)
body:
Now everyday there is someone on this board who who complains about nerfing someone, well guess what I'm not doing that...
I want someone removed from the League of Legends Champion pool. Now who is this champion well its Fiora of course

here are some reasons why in less effective to most effective:
1) She's cancer.
2) She is unbalanced because of her.
 - True Damage.
 - Being able to go immune to cc.
 - Gives everyone Cancer.

* I know cancer is no laughing joke but seriously who ever created this champion made another cancer.

replies.body: This is literally the worst post I've ever seen.

.... Noobs complaining about certain champs thats cancer
She has so much counterplay its not funny. She may be strong but if your not an idiot shes beatable the nerfs to her were quick good.

ty you are a smart man yes 
this Jon snow knows nothing

Fiora is a little strong ATM but she's definitely beatable. You just have to show respect in lane and not get too aggressive. 

If you want to counter Fiora then try Jax or any of the baiting champions; Singed, Heimerdinger, Teemo and AP Shaco. They are very good at punishing aggressive melee champions, and Jax E just stops Fiora from using her passive and ult.
